name: Yoga / Stretching
description:
Includes stretching of more than 10 minutes

**0.4 points per minute**

name: Outdoor Run
description:
Includes running, jogging, hiking, walking for fitness and other forms of high-intensity ambulation
  
 ---  
 **7.5 points per mile**

name: Rowing
description:
Includes indoor rowers and ski ergs
 

 * **5.5 points per kilometer**

name: Lo-Intensity Cardio
description:
<~75% max HR
 

 If you can hold a conversation, it's low intensity (Includes most lifting, pilates, bouldering, elliptical, etc.)
 

 * **0.6 points per minute**

name: Horses
description:
Horses 

 * **16.75 points**

**[Video Link](https://youtu.be/iquGl1lm2gE?si=G03nwoEutW8qh3Ua)**

name: 10 Days of Mindfulness
description:
Meditate, journal, reflect, pray, etc. for at least 10 uninterrupted minutes for 10 straight days. 
 

 ---
 *Limit 1 per month.*
  
 ----
 Note: Please log 0 points every day to mark progress, and then 100 points on day 10.
 

 ----
 

 

 **+100 points**

name: Thigh Burner Special
description:
Reps: 5-10-15-20-25-20-15-10-5 [pyramid]
 

 Exercises: Lunges, Squats, Jump Squats
 

 * **Sequence:**
 * 5 Lunges (each leg)
 * 5 Squats
 * 5 Jump Squats     
 * 10 Lunges (each leg)
 * 10 Squats
 * 10 Jump Squats     
 * 15 Lunges
 * ‚Ä¶.etc. 
 

 (You end back down at 5)
   
 Notes: Rest as needed. No weights. You raise and lower yourself 500 times in this one.     
 

 * **+60 points**

name: Streak Bonus
description: One extra point each day that you maintain a streak. To keep your streak, you must earn at least 10 points per day. Be wary of the Jordy Effect (big workout but a bigger night out)

name: The Hunt Bonus
description: We will use this to input your Hunt Week Bonus. This will be done automatically at the end of The Hunt.

name: Drinks
description:
Alcoholic drinks 

**First drink of the day is "free", and then -5 points thereafter**

name: 26.2 mile run
description:
Must be completed in under 6 hours
 

 **+100 points** in addition to your running points

name: The Murph
description:
* 1 Mile Run
 * 100 Pull ups
 * 200 Push ups
 * 300 Air squats
 * 1 Mile Run
 

 

 * **65 points** 
 * Add **+20pts** if completed with a 20lb weighted vest

name: Skiing Half Day
description:
**15 points**
Note: Does not extend streak, so you need to do another workout on ski days!

name: Hi-Intensity Cardio
description:
**>~75% of max HR**
 

 Includes HIIT, interval training, Barry's, boxing and cardio-intensive sports 
 

 *(remove "bench time" / "rest time")*
 

 * **0.9 points per minute**

name: Burpee Challenge Week 2
description:
110 burpee challenge 
 

 * Under 10 minutes: **50 points**
 * Under 12 minutes: **30 points**
 * Over 12 minutes: **10 points**

name: Burpee Challenge Week 3
description:
120 burpee challenge
 

 

 * Under 10 minutes: **50 points**
 * Under 12 minutes: **30 points**
 * Over 12 minutes: **10 points**

name: Burpee Challenge Week 4
description: **0.5 points per burpee** in 10 minutes

name: Burpee Challenge Week 1
description:
100 burpee challenge 
 

 *
 * Under 10 minutes: **50 points**
 * Under 12 minutes: **30 points**
 * Over 12 minutes: **10 points**

name: 2.4 mile swim
description:
Must be completed in under 8 hours
 

 **+50 points** in addition to your cardio points

name: 112 mile bike ride
description:
Must be completed in under 8 hours
 

 

 **+100 points** in addition to your cardio points

name: 42.2k erg
description:
Must be completed in under 6 hours
 

 **+100 points** in addition to your rowing points

name: March Fitness Triathlon
description:
Completing any three marathon-equivalent events in the month of March (does not have to be on the same day)    
 

 Must be three different events (e.g., running 3 marathons does not count)
 

 **+100 points** in addition to your workout points and the marathon bonus!

name: Workout with a Friend
description:
**Week 2 only!**
 

 * If you workout with a friend, partner, colleague, etc. in a way that you normally wouldn‚Äôt
 * **+25 points**

name: The Partner Bonus
description: We will use this to input your The Partner Week Bonus. This will be done automatically at the end of The Partner Week.

name: Outdoor Cycling
description: Outdoor cycling. May include commute or training. For indoor rides, use either Low-Intensity or Hi-Intensity Cardio (depending on HR). 1.8 points per mile

name: Hotel Room Workout
description:
300 Squats / 200 Sit-ups / 100 Push-ups / 50 Jump Squats
 

 * **50 points**

name: Skiing Full Day
description:
**35 points**
Note: Does not extend streak, so you need to do another workout on ski days!

name: Overindulge
description:
Overindulgence, defined however you define it for yourself 

**-10 points**

name: Tracy Anderson Arms
description:
See how long you can go - once you rest your arms/put your arms down, your special is over and you can mark your time.
 

 One-time opportunity. Does not count toward the special workout limit.    
 

 --- 
 * Points: 
 * 4+ minutes = **20 Points**
 * Full Video= **40 Points**

 **[Link](https://youtu.be/MtEJvqsHG8o?si=HSvVOqhf90esJdvk)**

name: Sally-up challenge
description:
* <60 sec. = **0 points**
 * 60-90 sec. = **5 points**
 * 90-120 sec. = **15 points**
 * 120-180 sec. = **25 points**
 * Full Video = **40 points**
 

 **[Link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=41N6bKO-NVI)**

name: The Max
description:
1 Circuit = 25 Squats, 20 Curls | 25 Squats,  20 Lunges | 25 Squats, 20 Overhead Press | 25 Squats, 20 Bent Over Rows

*Rules:*
* (25lbs bar [women] / 45lbs bar [men]):
 * Do the reps at a pace so you don't need to take a break.
 * No rest in between exercises, can take short rest between circuits but NEVER PUT THE BAR DOWN.
 * If/when you put the bar down, your Max is over.
 

 

 

 

 **20 points per circuit** (maximum 60pts or 3 circuits)
